'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': "The Fendor-Bendor is a foldable fender for the rear wheel of the bicycle. It can be folded up small so it's easy to store it in the backpack or back pocket of a cycling jersey.

This project started with a design by Remko Siemerink and me during a 24 hour design event in Protospace (FabLab Utrecht). I've worked this design into a design ready for mass production and have produced and sold it under my own label WIT Industries, for 5 years.

In March 2016, I've transferred the design to Ass-Savers, which now produce and distribute it from Sweden.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Olaf', 'last_name': 'Wit', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Lead Bike Designer Circular E-Bike'}]}, {'title': 'Design, advice, graphics of bicycle hub dynamo (TBA)', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': None, 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Olaf', 'last_name': 'Wit', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Lead Bike Designer Circular E-Bike'}]}, {'title': 'Development of the Bombtrack Hook', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'Assigned by Richard Shaw of Bombtrack Bicycle Co. I developed the Bombtrack Hook into a fast and stable cyclocross / gravel racer. I assigned Stefan "Fish" Vis to give advise on the project from a rider's perspective.
The Bombtrack Hook became a steel performance bike, made with Columbus Cromor tubing and carbon fork with tapered steerer and built up with SRAM Rival and Avid BB7 disc brakes. 
It's race ready for cyclocross racing, but was designed to handle lots of terrain, from commuting to riding an off road Trans Alp. The latter was shown by Stefan Vis during the Bike TransAlp 2014.

I've designed the geometry, specced the tube set (together with Giorgio Sormani at Columbus), determined the specs and gave advise on color scheme.

Stefan Vis advised on the project as an experienced rider and racer, with the added value that he has technical knowledge. Together we developed the concept of a CX / gravel bike with relatively high bottombracket and to make it a "go-everywhere-fast" bike which fits relatively wide 40 mm tires.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Olaf', 'last_name': 'Wit', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Lead Bike Designer Circular E-Bike'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Stefan', 'last_name': 'Vis', 'name': None, 'headline': 'freelance Stagehand/Bike Mechanic'}]}, {'title': 'Bikesuit -
